title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr. Alexander Carlyle, Minister of Inveresk,
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: The genteel people of Prestonpans parish were all there ; and one young lady, to whom I had been long attached, not having been able to conceal her admiration  of my oratory, I inwardly applauded my own resolution of adhering to the promise I had made my family to persevere in the clerical profession.
